identificationModule.briefTitle: Characterization of Myeloproliferative Neoplasia With a Mutated IDH, SRSF2 or SF3B1 Allele (CARPEDIEM)
identificationModule.officialTitle: Characterization of Myeloproliferative Neoplasia With a Mutated IDH, SRSF2 or SF3B1 Allele

descriptionModule.briefSummary: Retrospective study assessing the impact of IDH1/2, SRSF2 or SF3B1 mutations on event free survival of MPN patients
descriptionModule.detailedDescription: Patients with a diagnosis of MPN and a mutation of IDH1/2, SRSF2 or SF3B1 will be included. Clinical and biological characterisation at diagnosis, as well as evlution will be recorded. Event free survival will be assessed in each group (event = thrombosis, transformation to mylofibrosis/acute leukemia, death).

eligibilityModule.eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Patients with MPN diagnosis
* Mutation in IDH1/2, SRSF2 or SF3B1

Exclusion Criteria:

* Unable to consent
eligibilityModule.studyPopulation: Patients followed by hematologists of the French Intergroup of MPN

ipdSharingStatementModule.description: All collected data that underlie results in a publication
ipdSharingStatementModule.timeFrame: Data will be available beginning three years and ending fifteen years following the final study report completion
ipdSharingStatementModule.accessCriteria: Data access requests will be reviewed by the internal committee of Brest UH. Requestors will be required to sign and complete a data access agreement
